case_address_found_1: South from State Route 86 near mile marker 56
case_circumstances: US Border Patrol found decedent along dirt road that runs south from State Route 86 near mile marker 56 on the Tohono O'odham Reservation. The individual was found with receipts from a health clinic in Hermosillo, Sonoro on June 4, 2008 in the name of "Junio Joel Ruiz".  This name has not been verified by the Mexican Consulate.
